topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d41b6663687252c92e0300#post_54d41b6663687252c92e0300
It's one of the reasons why if magic or such shit were real I would be giddy with excitement instead of scared, cause let's say pyromancy existed but nothing else that would be the entire fucking fossil fuel industry dead overnight and a clean energy source so that would be upwards of a hundred billions of dollars a day in profit; or let's go with a even lamer spell and light illumination, electric lightbulbs would be gone, monitors would be massively redone to work with the new system and shit.

The people that go "if magic were real it would be useless" or such just outright lack any sort of imagination.

topics.body:
"OH NO!":http://www.equestriadaily.com/2015/02/abc-nightline-looking-to-interview.html

I may not be a brony, but this is going to suck cause, with how the majority of people haven't been paying attention to gamergate, the 90's moral panic is back in full swing.  ABC lately has been going after all of fucking geek culture and other media outlets are doing the same.  The good side is that geek culture is mainstream and chances are how 24/7 news is trying to create another 90's moral panic is going to hilariously fail; the downside is that they're going to stir up shit.
